page.title: 19Paint Factory
page.content: The TKS paint factory is the largest of the few factories in Cuxton; it has been manufacturing paint for about 30 years. The paint is used for protecting surfaces and making things look nice. Most of the paint made here is sold to industry, especially the public service industries and to local authorities. The yellow paint used on mechanical diggers, and other road-making machines, is made by TKS. The paint is manufactured from powders called pigments, and chemicals blended with resins, oil or water in ball mills which produce a smooth creamy mixture. The factory makes about 4,000 litres of paint a day, and as the materials used in making paint can be dangerous to health, the people who work there have to wear protective clothing. Of the 80 people working for the company about 40 live in Cuxton.
